body_html:
@vladfi1

I've built gpu-tensorflow with gcc 5.3.

How? The last time I tried to do that, the compilation failed due to explicit version checks in the CUDA headers.
Could you post instructions how you did it? I'm very interested to compile TensorFlow with newer compilers.

@vladfi1 

> I've built gpu-tensorflow with gcc 5.3.

How? The last time I tried to do that, the compilation failed due to explicit version checks in the CUDA headers.
Could you post instructions how you did it? I'm very interested to compile TensorFlow with newer compilers.
